name: monodeps
description: simple tool to return list of cross dependant packages in a monorepo

scripts.setup: npm run setup-example && npm run setup-example-circular
scripts.setup-example: cd ./test/example/a && npm install && cd ../b && npm install && cd ../c && npm install
scripts.setup-example-circular: cd ./test/example-circular/a && npm install && cd ../b && npm install && cd ../c && npm install
